channel.title: What's wrong with this? Socket closed
channel.description:
Well I don't know if I'm getting ddosed (UDP flood) on my vps but i'm getting this error (some people are still playing though):
[code] socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129) at client.fillInStream(client.java:8574) at client.run(client.java:17417) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
What does that mean?

item.title: What's wrong with this? Socket closed
item.dc:creator: @gmoney455 gmoney455
item.description:
@gmoney455 wrote:

did i mention i have a 317? this could be different cause i dont see what your talking about.

Read full topic
item.source: What's wrong with this? Socket closed

item.title: What's wrong with this? Socket closed
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

[quote=“Jddogg9, post:3, topic:328363”][quote author=nardoscape link=topic=424754.msg3119407#msg3119407 date=1265400905]
you did something wrong in your client.java retrace your steps.
[/quote]

No, I did not.

I just found the problem, someone was trying to flood my server using UDP socket, which caused them to become a nulled player, thus giving me this error.

Thanks for the false report though.[/quote]

Nulled account,
Well possibly delete the nulled account it should be in your account folder…

Read full topic

@Jddogg9 wrote:

nardoscape:

you did something wrong in your client.java retrace your steps.

No, I did not.

I just found the problem, someone was trying to flood my server using UDP socket, which caused them to become a nulled player, thus giving me this error.

Thanks for the false report though.
